projects.title: Turbulent Flow Control
projects.description: This project allowed me to apply advanced machine learning techniques, particularly topological data analysis with deep reinforcement learning, to control turbulent flows. I utilized machine learning tools to optimize performance and data analysis techniques to analyze results while collaborating with a multidisciplinary team.

projects.title: Signal Reconstruction
projects.description: This project focuses on the reconstruction of signals in aeroacoustics, capturing essential oscillations for noise generation. I utilized genetic algorithms, gradient descent, and reinforcement learning to optimize the reconstruction process. For the first time, I developed a Streamlit application that allows me to define a target signal, apply algorithms to capture all its frequencies, and measure their performance. This approach refined my algorithms, significantly increasing the accuracy of acoustic analyses. I've learned a lot!

projects.title: Quality Analysis
projects.description: Personal study project. I was responsible for developing a model capable of explaining the causes of defects present on steel rolls at the end of their manufacturing process. The main AI technique used was decision trees, which allowed me to understand the challenges related to defect detection in industrial materials.
